title: Language Learning Simulation Course Using Graphic Organizers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in graphic organizer creation and utilization through language learning simulations in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners can create a topic-detail hierarchical structure graphic organizer with 90% accuracy by analyzing textual information in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can explain and reconstruct core concepts of linguistic materials with over 85% accuracy using the generated graphic organizer.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of their own graphic organizer compared to the instructor-provided one with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
